96328.持ち前の 正義感の強さから 我が主は\n住民の失踪事件の 調査に乗り出した。\n:
Driven by his strong sense of justice, my lord set out to investigate the citizens' disappearances.
A few days into the investigation, on a moonlit night...that's when it happened.

96329.放心状態の男がひとり リンジャーラの住む\n中央塔へ入っていくのを 見かけたのだ:
A dazed looking man was seen entering the
central tower where Linjara resided.
My lord decided to follow him.

96330.男を追って着いたのは 中央塔の周辺に建つ\n５つの塔のひとつだった。\nそして:
Following the man, we ended up in one of the
five towers that surrounded the central one.
Inside, we witnessed something incredible.

96331.そこでは 異形の魔人が 男を…頭から……。\nその傍らには 表情の無いリンジャー:
There, a otherworldly-looking demon devoured the man...head-first. Beside it stood Linjara, with no expression on his face.
My lord confronted him with a stern look.

96332.リンジャーラは 宝珠を闇に染め 魔人を召喚し\n強大なチカラを得たのだと 告げた:
Linjara said that he had tainted the jewel with darkness, summoning the fiend and gaining an immense power.
He claimed that such power was necessary for the city's prosperity.

96333.主が 何か言おうとした瞬間 塔が大きく揺れた。\n私達があわてて外へと脱出すると:
Just as my lord was about to speak, the tower shook violently. We rushed outside, only to see countless demons pouring out of the other
towers...
